Articles.Content:
I just heard from a hacker who hacked squads servers that 1.1 will have these features!

**Redone part textures and models**

The dev's feel that the current part look is insufficient for a game where kerbals build spaceships so they are downgrading them all to repossessed rubbish bins.

**Overhauled Solar system!**

All planets except kerbin and the mun will be removed from the game and the remaining two will be scaled down to less than 20km radius.

**Kerbal recruiting source!**

All kerbals will now be recruited from the local Asylum, NOW WE KNOW WHERE THEY GOT JEB!!

Here is a screenshot of the next update:

![tumblr_ly7i0wVGiJ1qk0cbw.png](https://media.tumblr.com/tumblr_ly7i0wVGiJ1qk0cbw.png)

> 
>  
> ![image544.png](http://www.androidpolice.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/03/image544.png)

11/10 Better graphics than Space Engine

"I can't stop!" The Queen of England

Voted for US federal judge 9375 years in a row!

As a totally legit Mod, I shall smite thee for your insolence caused by you leaking these highly-sensitive details!

Uh... I mean... I would... if I actually had a Ban Hammah to use... ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)

I'm not mad, I'm just a little disappointed that [I created a much more time-consuming April Fool's thread saying a very similar thing to yours](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/114507-KSP-1-2-Update-Your-Questions-Answered%21), and you decided to post this anyways.

I feel like one of the key things that makes April Fool's so great is its originality, and if that's taken away, these sorts of things get really old, *really* quick.

I didn't mean any offence. I hope you can understand where I'm coming from.

-Upsilon
April the second please hurry up I can't deal with all this stuff!
See what you did Kasper? Do you see what you did?

> 
> I'm not mad, I'm just a little disappointed that [I created a much more time-consuming April Fool's thread saying a very similar thing to yours](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/114507-KSP-1-2-Update-Your-Questions-Answered%21), and you decided to post this anyways.
> I feel like one of the key things that makes April Fool's so great is its originality, and if that's taken away, these sorts of things get really old, *really* quick.
> 
> I didn't mean any offence. I hope you can understand where I'm coming from.
> 
> -Upsilon

I feel like yours was much better executed. No offense to OP, of course.

> 
> April the second please hurry up I can't deal with all this stuff!

Guys, this thread broke the official KPS rules:

> 
> Rule 5: No one is allowed to read this, if someone does, that one shall be banned

Thread locked.

> 
> I'm not mad, I'm just a little disappointed that [I created a much more time-consuming April Fool's thread saying a very similar thing to yours](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/114507-KSP-1-2-Update-Your-Questions-Answered%21), and you decided to post this anyways.

April fools was old years ago none of the "pranks" have been well thought out or fooled anyone your thread and this one are just forum spam.

> 
> Guys, this thread broke the official KPS rules:
> Thread locked.

**[Going too far with the reaction images there]**

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-01T21:04:04Z" title="04/01/2015 09:04  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 1, 2015</time> by sal\_vager**
